name: set segment settings and start segment ramp
end and clear segment settings

enable the schedule selection when idle

show active segment
check soak
check temps and start soak

status
segment is disabled so advance to next

initialize variables

func:
var selected_zone = global.get('pid.selected_zone') || 0
global.set('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].autotune.active', true)
msg.setpoint = global.get('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].autotune.setpoint') || 0
msg.topic = 'temp-BK'
msg.cmd = 'start'
msg.payload = 0
return msg;

var selected_zone = global.get('pid.selected_zone') || 0
global.set('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].autotune.active', false)
msg.cmd = 'stop'
return msg;

var selected_zone = global.get('pid.selected_zone') || 0
var selected_action = global.get('pid.selected_action') || 0 // 'heating', 'cooling', 'maintaining'
global.set('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].autotune.active', false)

if (msg.state == 'succeeded') {
    global.set('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].settings.' + selected_action + '.gain.Kp', msg.payload.Kp)
    global.set('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].settings.' + selected_action + '.gain.Ki', msg.payload.Ki)
    global.set('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].settings.' + selected_action + '.gain.Kd', msg.payload.Kd)
} 

var msg_out = { enabled: true } // enable any dashboard ui
return msg_out

var selected_zone = global.get('pid.selected_zone') || 0
msg.payload = parseFloat(global.get('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].parameters.setpoint'))
msg.topic = 'Setpoint'
return msg;

var selected_zone = global.get('pid.selected_zone') || 0
msg.payload = parseFloat(global.get('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].parameters.process')).toFixed(2)
msg.topic = 'Process'
return msg;

var selected_zone = global.get('pid.selected_zone') || 0
msg.payload = parseFloat(global.get('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].parameters.control')).toFixed(2)
msg.topic = 'Control'
return msg;

var selected_zone = global.get('pid.selected_zone') || 0
var selected_action = global.get('pid.selected_action') || 0 // 'heating', 'cooling', 'maintaining'
msg.payload = global.get('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].settings.' + selected_action + '.gain.Kp') || 0
return msg;

var selected_zone = global.get('pid.selected_zone') || 0
var selected_action = global.get('pid.selected_action') // 'heating', 'cooling', 'maintaining'
msg.payload = global.get('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].settings.' + selected_action + '.gain.Ki') || 0
return msg;

var selected_zone = global.get('pid.selected_zone') || 0
var selected_action = global.get('pid.selected_action') || 0 // 'heating', 'cooling', 'maintaining'
msg.payload = global.get('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].settings.' + selected_action + '.gain.Kd') || 0
return msg;

var selected_zone = global.get('pid.selected_zone') || 0
var selected_action = global.get('pid.selected_action') || 0 // 'heating', 'cooling', 'maintaining'
global.set('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].settings.' + selected_action + '.gain.Kp', msg.payload)
return msg;

var selected_zone = global.get('pid.selected_zone') || 0
var selected_action = global.get('pid.selected_action') || 0 // 'heating', 'cooling', 'maintaining'
global.set('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].settings.' + selected_action + '.gain.Ki', msg.payload)
return msg;

var selected_zone = global.get('pid.selected_zone') || 0
var selected_action = global.get('pid.selected_action') || 0 // 'heating', 'cooling', 'maintaining'
global.set('pid.zone[' + selected_zone + '].settings.' + selected_action + '.gain.Kd', msg.payload)
return msg;

msg.payload = global.get('pid.selected_action') || 0 // 'heating', 'cooling', 'maintaining'
return msg;

global.set('pid.selected_action', msg.payload)
return msg;

name: initialize variables
handle analog input

temp is bad
temp is bad
monitor thermocouple failure
info:
this section of nodes will start a timer when 
the thermocouple returned data is either
32 or NaN.

after the timer has expired the thermocouple
will be considered faulty.

when the thermocouple begins transmitting 
values other than 32 or NaN again another
timer will start.

once this timer expires then the thermocouple
will be considered ok again.
